meanings.sent1: The old car had a dinted door from years of use.
meanings.sent2: The dinted surface of the table showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The dinted can of soda looked like it had been through a lot.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as dinted as the scratched-up metal.
meanings.sent5: The dinted shield bore the scars of many battles.

meanings.definition: To make a dent or indentation in something.
meanings.sent1: He dinted the can by accidentally dropping it.
meanings.sent2: The hammer dinted the metal surface with a single blow.
meanings.sent3: She playfully dinted the clay with her fingers.
meanings.sent4: His words dinted her confidence more than he realized.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rock dinted the soft ground upon impact.
